member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Analytics.TraceMonitor
member.summary: Singleton class for creating IAnalyticsMonitor instance and enabling RadControls analytics support. Call Initialize static method with an instance of to customize behavior of the constructed monitor.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Analytics.TraceMonitor.Initialize(System.Windows.Application,System.String)
member.summary: Create an instance using the default settings and enables RadControls analytics support.
member.param: The application instance. It is used to report unhandled exceptions and stops monitor on application exit event.
The id of the product to monitor.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Analytics.TraceMonitor.Initialize(System.Windows.Application,Telerik.Windows.Analytics.TraceMonitorSettings)
member.summary: Create an instance using the provided settings and enables RadControls analytics support.
member.param: The application instance. It is used to report unhandled exceptions and stops monitor on application exit event.
The settings to use for constructing the instance.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Analytics.TraceMonitorSettings
member.summary: Class containing the settings used for constructing instance. Instances are preloaded with default settings which can be adjusted before instance is being passed to the TraceMonitor.Initialize(TraceMonitorSettings) method.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Analytics.TraceMonitorSettings.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TraceMonitorSettings class.
member.param: The id of the product to monitor.
